sentences.sContent: If I have to stay late at work tonight, it won’t matter because we can go out another night.
sentences.sCn: 如果今晚我必须工作到很晚的话，那也没关系，我们可以改天晚上再出去。

sentences.sContent: Does it matter what I think?
Do you think it matters that the cups and saucers don’t match?
sentences.sCn: 你觉得茶杯与杯托不相配要紧吗？

sentences.sContent: campaigning on issues that really matter
sentences.sCn: 以重大问题为竞选议题

sentences.sContent: Money was the only thing that mattered to him.
sentences.sCn: 对他来说，钱是唯一重要的东西。

sentences.sContent: I don’t care what it looks like – what matters is that it works.
sentences.sCn: 我不在乎外观——要紧的是它要管用。

sentences.sContent: At last she was with the man she loved and nothing else mattered .
sentences.sCn: 最终她和她所爱的男人在一起了，其他都无关紧要。

sentences.sContent: She said very little during the meal. Not that it mattered (= it was not important ) .
sentences.sCn: 她吃饭时话很少，那倒无所谓。

sentences.sContent: ...Often the best ideas for big changes come from unexpected places — it’s just a matter of tuning in...
...I momentarily wondered if I couldn't just call an expert on the subject matter which I was tackling...
...It doesn't matter when or how much a person sleeps...
...The first is that no matter how many women may be getting college degrees...
...The pledge has been a matter of some debate in philanthropic and non-profit circles...
...it's a matter of paying now for the hardware to save later on the utilities...
...While graduates from top universities are still likely to get a good job, no matter what their major is...
...But it actually shouldn't matter to you nearly as much as you think...
...A search is now under way to confirm the suspected existence of particles of matter that move at a speed greater than light...
...Bishop describes the problem as simply a matter of priorities...
...with the museums and restaurants in Washington I’ll be happy here no matter what the temperature.Q：What does the woman mean...

phrases.pCn: 有机质；有机物；有机物质
就此而言；至于那个；说到那一点
无论发生什么事；无论出现什么情况
在这件事情上；对这个问题
只是时间问题；某事肯定发生只是时间问题而已
左右；大约只不过在…之内

words.tran: 婚姻的；与婚姻有关的；根据结婚的惯例的

trans.tranOther: to be important, especially to be important to you, or to have an effect on what happens
